• Give oxygen via face mask and keep patient warm.
• Consider a central venous pressure (CVP) line through a cubital vein, if feasible
• Insert an i ndwelling urinary catheter and monitor hourly urine output.
• Give fluids to maintain the systolic BP ≥100 mmHg, or a CVP of six cm H20, but beware of fluid overload in
patients with und
